sentences.english: He turns and scolds a group of local fighters lounging at a nearby roadblock.
sentences.chinese: 他轉過身，罵了在附近的路障閒逛當地戰士組。
警察在各入口處都設置了路障。

sentences.english: Police parked vans in front of the cathedral to block access to the nearby LSE.
sentences.chinese: 警察通過設置路障封鎖了通往倫敦證交所的通道。

sentences.english: They had to detour a road-block.
At least three avenues of valid immigration have discerned roadblocks erected.
sentences.chinese: 至少有三條合法移民之路已經豎起了“路障”。

sentences.english: Undertaking the collation research on " The Three Kingdoms ", interchangeable words are an inevitable obstacle.
sentences.chinese: 從事《三國志》的整理研究，通假字是繞不過的路障。

sentences.english: A civilian drives a tractor in the background around the roadblock.
sentences.chinese: 背景是一個平民駕駛着一輛拖拉機駛過路障。

sentences.english: Your brain may need its roadblocks eliminated, or it might just need some new input.
sentences.chinese: 你的大腦需要清除路障，或者只是需要獲得新的輸入。

sentences.english: At least three avenues of legal immigration have seen roadblocks erected.
sentences.chinese: 至少有三條合法移民之路已經豎起了“路障”。

sentences.english: The news was that the mob had broken down the barricades and were even then preparing to storm the palace.
sentences.chinese: 傳來的消息說暴民已經衝破了路障，正準備直搗宮廷。

sentences.english: Gbagbo militants have set up barricades in pro-Ouattara neighborhoods.
sentences.chinese: 支持巴博的激進分子在親瓦塔拉的社區設立了路障。

sentences.english: Police in maintaining order and placed in a number of roadblocks near shattered.
sentences.chinese: 警方在維持秩序，並在一些震裂處附近放置路障。

sentences.english: Roadblocks are sign-posts letting you know that success is just around the corner.
sentences.chinese: 路障是讓你知道成功就在這個角落附近的路標。

sentences.english: We're barricaded in and you'll be safe here.
sentences.chinese: 我們在這設了路障，你在這兒會安全的。

sentences.english: Road-blocks were sep up by the police to catch the escaped prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 爲了抓住逃犯，警察在路上豎立了路障。

sentences.english: In the desert outside the city, I came to a roadblock manned by a large group of rebels.
sentences.chinese: 我來到城外的沙漠裏，路障後有大量武裝好的叛軍。

definition: cheval de frise (a type of barrier)
